reviewText: The first act was kinda a mess, but it does get better...
I felt is was a pretty fun ride. If you liked the first one, this is a worthy follow up. I would love to see more of these made.

No Plot Spoilers.

This follow-up to The Heir Apparent lost its drive.  On the cover of the DVD it shows Sharon Stone with a gun, leading you to believe that she is involved in action scenes and has a shoot-out.  She never has a gun in the film, therefore no shoot-out.

The plot is not interesting, and you end up saying "Why do I care what happens to Largo?"

When you stop caring about the protagonist, you stop caring about the film.
